website_summaries.verdict: Extra-long plates are great for getting super close to the scalp or styling bangs.
pros: With a full two-year warranty, you can feel safe trying out this flat iron
Temperature controls between 265 and 450 degrees Fahrenheit
"Mirror" titanium plates are super smooth, creating sleek and shiny hair
cons: Some users have noted that their curly hair can get caught on the plates if they are not precise when placing their hair

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot quick!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome awesome! packaging is nice and easy to open! Comes with a glove which is very necessary to avoid burns! I love the size and that it warms up super quickly! No more plugging my flat iron in while I get dressed and then it tilts and melt something! Works well on my super curly hair and on my nieces curly hair as well! Easy to use button and easy to flip ends with! Doesn't burn hair and leaves it feeling soft. Also perfect size to reach hard to get pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Ivonnylda Spinola

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking straight hair
customer_reviews.text: Whoa! I have wavy full hair, I’ve been using ceramic straightest for years at 410 degrees and needed several pass throughs with the flat iron and having to wait til the next day to see if I missed any spots or for the frizz to come down notch Right after using this iron at 430 degrees I saw pretty impressive results with shiny hair that’s soft to the touch and looks like naturally straight hair. It lays well and blows nicely in the breeze without frizzing. Instant results. I recommend using the glove and following with a round brush to help cool the hair down
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Varela

customer_reviews.title: I love my new ISA Professional Titanium Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: I love my new ISA Professional Titanium Flat Iron! It leaves my hair silky smooth, straight and silky looking I got a Brazilian Keratin. I love the way the flat iron is easy to handle and glides its is also able to reach those hard to reach the areas. I have wavy/curly hair so I've been thru alot of flat irons and this by far is the best one that I have purchased that actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Chantal

customer_reviews.title: Results Not as Described
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. This is not a superior product as described. Did not achieve silky results. The handle was also very hot 🔥 to handle and the Beautiful Finish melted off the edges! Returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: alb4truth

customer_reviews.title: Best flat iron EVER
customer_reviews.text: I paid FULL PRICE for this, so I have no motivation to overrate it. I've had cheap flat irons, as well as many expensive ones. This ISA is hands-down the best I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Smoothing
customer_reviews.text: This flat iron has been great so far. I have had Chi ad Dolia flat irons in the past and the Isa is far more smoothing than either of them(my hair is coars and frizzy). The plates are smooth and my hair does not get caught in anything, gives a decent amount of curl if you want it. Time will tell how it holds up...
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great Iron. Love the color and size
customer_reviews.text: Great Iron. Love the color and size. Easy to hold and work through your hair. Works very well with my hair which is very curly and makes it pretty straight. Warms up pretty quickly and love the heating options. I bought this titanium iron after my professional flat iron was not working anymore and their website was not working. As always went on Amazon and many options to choose from. Thanks for a great product. Would recommended to others.
customer_reviews.author: awesome girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This straightener works very well and the longer plates with the narrow pointed ends are an extra plus! I have curly hair that's extremely unruly and crazy and usually have a hard time finding a straightener that not only straightens my hair well but keeps my hair straightened for longer than an hour! My hairs still straight though and the day is almost over already! Other reviewers mentioned that it pulls their hair but I didnt experience any pulling or snagging at all! I love my new straightener!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Santos

customer_reviews.title: Grabs hair and pulls it out by the roots
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly and it is nice to digitally choose your desired temp but it grabs my hair and pulls some of it out by the roots so I would not buy it again and would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten M.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this flat iron for my daughter. She normally wears a sew in around 18 inches. She loves to wear her hair straight. This flat iron worked great. It straightened her hair with just one try, no need to go over the hair a few times with the heat like other flat iron. Also. It doesn’t make your hair so hot after the press that you can’t touch it. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa P

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! After several tries, I Finally found the best product on the market. It is the perfect size to style my long hair, it saves me so much time since it can style larger sections of hair with each pass. Also, its shape and weight make it much more easier to get closer to the roots without burning scalp or ears :) Leaves my hair straight and smoth and it also styles awesome waves. I absolutly recomend it <3
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I used a lot of brand iron but this is last for me Finally I found wnat i want very light doesnt pull hair perfect shine and soft. you can curly easly you can style your hair less than 10 minutes and automatic shut down,dual voltage and digital screen. You can straight your hair very easily I really like it thank you.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Item came and there was space between blades...they didn't touch the hair except on the sides...no problem returning though!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hughes

customer_reviews.title: This flat iron has been great! The iron heats up quickly and is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This flat iron has been great! The iron heats up quickly and is easy to use without burning or scorching my hair. Straightening my hair has never been quicker or easier. The titanium plates glide along the hair without excessive pulling or tugging. It is easy to handle and feels good in the hand. The construction and manufacturing appears to be of great quality and I believe that this iron will outlast the previous ones I had. I would highly recommend this iron.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG! a flat iron that works great under $50!!
customer_reviews.text: OK, I have curly hair, so my flat iron has to work VERY GOOD and this one does, and the bonus is it is reasonability priced!! and yes what the reviews say about it gliding thru your hair is correct, I wait to make this review after using it for a month!! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Allsbrooks

customer_reviews.title: This has the heat to prove it's worth
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect flat iron to straighten your hair without a lot of heat. It heats up quickly and does a fantastic job of giving you the flaxen soft hair you've always dreamed of!
customer_reviews.author: Narciden

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend this much on a straighter, but then I thought why not invest in myself? If it doesn't work I'll just send it back. It's awesome!! I have super thick hair so the high temperature is perfect for me, it's nice and smooth, doesn't pull or snag my hair the way other straightners do. The shape makes it easy to.get close to the roots. It's very comfortable to hold, you don't have to squeeze the hell out of it, it is a nice tight grasp. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: The iron was difficult to use since the grips were hard to hold together to provide adequate pressure. It maintained heat well but it took too long.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Park

customer_reviews.title: I returned them immediately
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for the quality. I’ve had better hair straighteners for a much cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her straightener. It works really well. We like how you can change the temperature of the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Mudderduckie

customer_reviews.title: This product left my hair frizzy
customer_reviews.text: The only good things I can say about this product is that it is pretty and heard up fast. It did not straighten my hair as good as my old flat iron did and left my hair frizzy and fly away. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: rosa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This flat iron is very good. It warms up fast and very easy to use. The previous one that I had, gave me split ends. This one does not.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, definitely sticking with Chi!
customer_reviews.text: It worked okay, not great the first few months and now it hardly works at all! Very disappointed because it wasn’t cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it, saying best curling iron she ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have struggled to find a really good flat iron and this one is amazing- worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this iron, it's made me hair incredibly soft and smooth. I highly recommend this iron to anyone looking for healthy hair. My hair is extremely thick and normally takes forever to straighten, this iron cut the time in half.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst flat iron ever! At the highest temp couldn't straighten my hair. The old one I was replacing worked better, what a dissapointment!
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: Flatiron
customer_reviews.text: It's a great flatiron, should have replaced my existing one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: kmjt

customer_reviews.title: This is the FIRST of many straighteners I have bought that I am actually 100% satisfied with. It straightens my hair in half the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very wavy and somewhat uncontrollable hair. This is the FIRST of many straighteners I have bought that I am actually 100% satisfied with. It straightens my hair in half the time I am use to with other straighteners and my hair STAYS straight! HIghly recommend for those of you with coarse wavy hair!
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Patty

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the third brand that I try, the previous ones were either too hot (bad for my hair) or not hot enought to get it done. This brand is just in the sweet spot. Ive been using it for a couple of weeks and it just works great.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Chi worked wayyyy better!
customer_reviews.text: The hair doesn't remain straight. Gets frizzy after awhile. I have to keep straightening it over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Montez

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love my new flatiron! It heats up quickly, is easy to use, and does the job well!
customer_reviews.author: HighEnergy

customer_reviews.title: No gap
customer_reviews.text: While the other heating Iron hap a huge gap between the plates, these were flush. My girlfriend can use this one with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: A. Davidson Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Great flat iron
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend asked me for this iron after her stylist recommended it to her and she loves it. I'm just glad she can do her hair in almost half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Morris

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this flat iron
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this flat iron. Leaves my hair much more smooth than my last iron. Fewer 'fly aways' left sticking out too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this flat iron. It glides smoothly and leaves the hair with a shine. The only downfall I see is that sometimes at the tip of the flat iron a few pieces of hair will get stuck and pulled out. Other than this I would say that this is probably one of the best flat irons I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect. Everyone has different hair types
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Everyone has different hair types. Mine is more on the fine side. You can adjust the heat settings for your liking. It adjusts from 350degrees at 450degrees. My daughter has very thick hair, she uses the higher setting and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Maglione

customer_reviews.title: Of course everyone's hair is different and I must also ...
customer_reviews.text: Of course everyone's hair is different and I must also say that my goal was to purchase a high quality flat iron to use to wave my hair. Unfortunately this wasn't the iron for me. It simply did not work well, even after turning the heat up as high as I thought was safe. I almost thought that perhaps the titanium surface was too "slippery" to grip my hair. Even to achieve a straight look it would have taken several passes. I'm returning it but will attempt to purchase another brand, most likely ceramic or tourmaline, not titanium.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for natural curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally long curly hair. All my life I have never found a flat iron that straighten my hair. I would always go to the hair salon. I tried this out and I have never experienced such straight silky hair. Absolutly worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Taitt

customer_reviews.title: Pisssssssed!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this about a year, and it already stopped working!
customer_reviews.author: @abadassforce

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I like the temperature control and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to get a new flat iron for a while so I settled on this one. I love it. I like the temperature control and it my hair looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Junita

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its ok not as good as I expected I still use my store bought one from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This iron has made my hair silky and gorgeous, I’ve never used anything as good as this. It’s never damaged my hair, I really recommend using this product. I love this!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I like the cord because it doesn’t tangle. It heats up quick and works really well. Doesn’t snag my hair at all. I am happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works well , not perfect , can go up to 450 degrees, not as easy to curve because it's somewhat long or maybe , it's operator error.
customer_reviews.author: Kishor

customer_reviews.title: I used this straighener and found it excellent for the very fine hair that I have
customer_reviews.text: I used this straighener and found it excellent for the very fine hair that I have . Strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Prompt Service!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the straightener and because she's happy, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: It delivers a smooth and shiny look. However if ...
customer_reviews.text: It delivers a smooth and shiny look. However if you're looking to curl it doesn't last more than thirty minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J. Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Hair gets caught up in the blades but over all makes ypur hair straight flat
customer_reviews.author: maria custodio

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'd been using a cheap flat iron for far too long and it was time to upgrade to something that wouldn't damage my hair each time I use it. I could barely use it since my (fine & thin) hair gets caught in the edges of the end of the iron every time which hurts and pulls my hair out. This makes straightening or curling my hair with it nearly impossible without yanking out multiple strands of hair with each clamp down...not what I expected for the price. I'm sadly disappointed with my purchase. I just donated this straightener and went back to my cheap one, total waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: tierneymarie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this flat iron, was using chi this one is way far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Winfrey

customer_reviews.title: As far as flat irons go, it does its ...
customer_reviews.text: As far as flat irons go, it does its job. The only negative I have is that it constantly rips my hair out every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: L Cato

customer_reviews.title: But this is the greatest straightener I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I don't ordinarily write reviews... But this is the greatest straightener I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the BESTflat iron I've ever owned ...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BESTflat iron I've ever owned, and I've had 4-5 of them. I have thick course kinky hair, and this iron tames my hair so well. I'm considering buying another one. It heats up in less than a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Ferraro

customer_reviews.title: Isa  Professional Titanium Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: I put it on the highest setting and it still didn't straighten my hair. I tried doing as little as possible and it still didn't work on my hair. Too expensive to not work! I've never had this issue w/ those costing less. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get a discount for this review
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most of the reviews, I did not receive a discount for my review on the item. This flat iron catches and pulls out hair quite a bit because the plate doesn't sit close enough to the base. It is bad enough that I am returning the straightner. Also, the temp doesn't seem to be a true temp. My old U Smooth worked much better. I was sad I tried something new.
customer_reviews.author: GS1

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the quality especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product in May and it has already stopped working. Very disappointed in the quality especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Item is not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: It's not a morrir surface as advertised. Do not order this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected. The display is ...
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected. The display is hard to read. It's not an instant heat up nor a shut off if forgotten and left on. I found it a bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flat iron except for the hair pulling
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, I like this flat iron. It's solidly built, it heats quickly, and it flattens hair in a short amount of time. The only problem is that the pointed end catches hair between the titanium plate and the casing and pulls it out. Each time I use it, there are 4-5 strands stuck in there. One might be able to prevent this by clipping up any hair that isn't being targeted with the flat iron. However, if you're like me, you're in too much of a hurry to do this and just want to stick the iron in and flatten out any bumps. Whenever you do this, you get your hair pulled.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie B's Knees

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3C hair. The photo on the left is after I blew it out. The photo on the left is after using the flat iron. My ends are terrible because I need a trim, but the flat iron did a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Princess S. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Ok, well i spent much more than i wanted to inn a flat iron.... But, we must keep in mind it was a $300 iron i got for more than 50 off... That being said still costly, BUT, sorry every penny. I love this iron out works beautifully. And i can even Just flat iron a second day and still Have beautiful smooth hair...without the trouble of blowing it out and everything So soon. The only down is a few strand do get caught .... But not enough to be a big worry
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McReynolds

customer_reviews.title: Proper Iron
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best iron I have used. It doesn't burn the hair and literally irons them, unlike other irons that I used. It's pretty long which is good for long hair as it can take more and save you some time. The iron is not heavy and sits in the hand nicely, the cord is long enough for you to maneuver it around and the display on top is very helpful. Overall I am extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty God

customer_reviews.title: nice flat iron
customer_reviews.text: Wow this flat iron is awesome. If only takes 2 swipes to get is smooth and it stays that way all day long. Omg I ordered it Sunday and received the next day on Prime. ****update****I noticed after use the 1" from the tip does not close all the way. I have to hold the tip down to get my hair straight closer to the end. contacted seller and was told it was that way so the hair would go through smoothly. I somehow don't believe that because my last iron didn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: lynndoll10

customer_reviews.title: Best flat iron I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I have thick hair with some natural curl, so getting it styled in the morning is always a drag. I stopped using a flat iron years ago because I felt like my hair always got snagged in the plates. I decided maybe it was time to try a nicer one to see if there was a difference, and wow, I couldn't be happier. Not only does my hair glide easily through this flat iron, but the style actually lasts all day. When I used to use a curling iron to straighten my hair, my hair would gradually get more and more body and frizz as the day wore on, but not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Jespree

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast. Heats up fast. Straightened my hair in one pass. Left my hair shiny and smooth. Well worth the money. Bought this to replace my Chi. Would definitely purchase again and recommend to my friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsie

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!!! It Works Beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new iron. I've been using a really cheap brand for years and never realized spending a few extra dollars would make such a huge difference in my hair. I have very frizzy and curly, old lady hair. My hair now stays straight and shiny all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: This doesnt hold a good curl nor does it straighten quick. I have to go over a piece multiple times and it breaks my hair off
customer_reviews.author: brandon miller

customer_reviews.title: I love it leaves your hair soft and straight no need ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my flat iron! I love it leaves your hair soft and straight no need to do it multiple times, the only thing is at the end your hair can get stuck because of the shape I do recommended! I had a Paul Mitchell but it mess up and this one is similar :)
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. But a chi or a brand you know
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. But a chi or a brand you know. It’s cheaper. I spent more money on this because I thought it’d be better. False.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Flat iron!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to use a flat iron many times over the years and always went back to my curling iron. NOT this time! It is so easy to handle and it can curl and straighten! I think because it is as narrow as it is makes all the diffence and it heats all the way to the tip. I am over 60 and didn't think I would ever master this. Worth every cent I spent on it! Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Kay West

customer_reviews.title: We defiantly like this the best so far
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my daughter. She swims a lot and I wanted her to have a safer flat iron so she damages her hair less. We defiantly like this the best so far. it works well and heats up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Iny

customer_reviews.title: Not for frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: This does not work for frizzy fragile hair. I am returning

customer_reviews.title: Great iron for thick wavy hair
customer_reviews.text: Great flat iron. I have thick curly medium length hair that needs a flat iron to finish up a blow out. This flat iron did not disappoint. It heats up quickly and stays heated as you use it. It’s thin size helps from making bumps in your hair. It felt like I was at the salon when I got through using it. Love it !!
customer_reviews.author: JBelisle

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I’ve owned a few high end straighteners and this is by far the best! Heats up super quickly and prevents damage. Big fan!
customer_reviews.author: msides1

customer_reviews.title: I'll be able to control that better.
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely thick, coarse hair and purchased this since it has a longer plate and can speed up my flat ironing! It is such a sleek product - heats up in seconds!!! It did pull my hair just a bit, which is the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars. I'm sure as I get more adept at handling it, I'll be able to control that better.
customer_reviews.author: Mel B

customer_reviews.title: Love this worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Great straightener! I love it! I had long hair now just went to a bob and it works great for straitening and for beach waves! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Faithfulbuyseller

customer_reviews.title: The price is great. Deffinetely a great deal. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: It is doing its job and straightens the hair very fast. The temperature is set digitally and very easy to use. My fiance loves it.
customer_reviews.author: alen81

customer_reviews.title: It was not what I expected. It did not ...
customer_reviews.text: It was not what I expected. It did not work as advertised. I used it a couple of times and burned my hair fast. I'm returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Flat iron
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have very thick curly hair and after I used the flatiron my hair was straight for 3 days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiancé and she loves it. Has had it for about 2 years now and still going strong. Had been well used. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Expected more for the price! Hair got caught up ...
customer_reviews.text: Expected more for the price! Hair got caught up underneath the plates. Plates do not press against each other tightly. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for thick,coarse hair!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for thick, coarse hair!! I have really thick hair and this straightener went through it in a third of the time as my last one. Made my hair feel softer and look shinier as well
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly1013

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews prior to buying and glad i purchased this one.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shape of this flat iron and it seems to straighten my hair much quicker than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: ... chi ceramic for years and felt there was no better. Boy was I wrong
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the chi ceramic for years and felt there was no better. Boy was I wrong. This iron is amazing. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally billeter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hair straightener. It glides over my fine hair nicely and leaves hair soft.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Davis

customer_reviews.title: I think this would be a great flat iron for fine to normal hair
customer_reviews.text: I think this would be a great flat iron for fine to normal hair. It does not work well for very thick coarse hair. It's pretty pricey considering. I do love the color, I love the digital display, it stays heated up throughout the process. The plates are just too small and I noticed they don't close flush unless you squeeze pretty tight so you have to go over the same piece of hair 50 times. So not great for thick hair but great for thinner hair but not sure worth all the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Sbuxgirl36

customer_reviews.title: Isa Titanium = Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic iron! The tapered design facilitates getting close to the roots and allows you to curl or flip ends if desired. Heats up quickly and has an automatic shut off feature, which should be mandatory. If a company is willing to scrimp on that safety feature, what does that tell you? Isa professional cares about their customers and is dedicated to a superior product. I researched irons extensively before selecting their titanium gem! I'm very satisfied with my purchase and if you are deliberating, you should add this to your cart and click buy. Your hair will look fabulous and if you have any concerns the excellent customer service and warrantee will make everything better.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It works amazingly. I have hair that is slightly curly and this cuts my straightening time in half. The slim design is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its an excellent product! It has very good quality! I really do recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ramon G.

customer_reviews.title: This iron will go to 450-degrees which works great with thick hair
customer_reviews.text: Works well and heats up fast. This iron will go to 450-degrees which works great with thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cp423

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a chi, but decided to try this . This flat iron works great. It works better than my chi. It doesn't take several passes to get hair straight. So less damage to my hair, and it lasts a lot longer. The only reason i gave it a 4 star is it will snag your hair occasionally. You have to hold the straightener differently due to the design. Once i get used to it . My hair my not snag on it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, glides right over my hair and does not lose heat at all!
customer_reviews.author: R2DJ

product_meta.title: Titanium Flat Iron Digital Hair Straightener by Isa Professional 1 Inch 2 Year Warranty
product_meta.description:
Titanium Flat Iron Hair Straightener with mirror titanium plates 

Silky smooth hair is the ultimate achievement for your hair! 

The ISA Professional Titanium is a breakthrough in hair styling. Its extra long 4.5" tapered plates will allow you to style larger sections of hair with each pass, and get closer to the roots on short hair or bangs without fear of burning your scalp. 

* Titanium plates * Neon background LCD display 
*Adjustable heat from 265 to 450 Fahrenheit (130 to 230 Celsius) 
* Fast and safe straightening, curls, waves 
* 360 degree no tangle cord 
* Full 2 year warranty 

You won't believe how silky smooth your hair will be after using our revolutionary Titanium flat iron. Digital temperature control makes sure the temperature is set precisely for YOUR hair. Temperature will be displayed precisely for maximum results! Give your hair the quality it deserves with ISA Professional products. 

Comes in a semi-gloss recyclable white gift box. Full 2 Year Warranty.

The flat iron hair straightener should be used after hair is washed, dried, and brushed. When used properly, ie perpendicular to hair and not parallel to hair, there is no hair pulling or breakage. The key elements of proper flat iron straightening with this appliance are: proper preparation of hair with drying and brushing, perpendicular use, slow controlled movements, and not trying to do too large a section of hair each time. The arc shaped tip of this straightener should be used on short hair/bangs, while the body of the straightener should be used for the rest of the hair - ie medium and long length.
feature_bullets: Titanium Flat Iron Hair Straightener with mirror titanium plates
Digital Flat Iron with Neon LCD background display
For straightening, flat ironing, curling hair.
